Subjects: abuses of the age; evils of the time
_description: Abuses of the age, in a Latin sermon — six lines, including some couplets

CULIi38.Transcription:
Worst is beststrengthe is akastean prou is pynelyȝt is
                    nyȝtand flyȝt is fyȝt& ded is aslawe
